data.eml:eml: Marsdenia yarlungzangboensis (Apocynaceae, Asclepiadoideae), a new species from Xizang, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Cheng, Ya, Ji-Dong, Tan, Yun-Hong, He, Hua-Jie, Dong, Gui-Jun, Li, De-Zhu (2019): Marsdenia yarlungzangboensis (Apocynaceae, Asclepiadoideae), a new species from Xizang, China. PhytoKeys 130: 85-92, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.130.34152, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.130.34152
